special_text:
{1}{U}{R}, Exile Parity from your hand: Activate one of her loyalty abilities without paying its costs. You may cast this card for as long as it remains exiled.
[+1]: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
[0]: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
[-2]: Parity deals 3 damage to any target.
